akn:section.akn:heading: Issuance of regulations; maintenance of rec­ords

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3811. Issuance of regulations; maintenance of rec­ords The Secretary is authorized to issue such regulations and to require the maintenance of such records as he deems necessary to carry out the provisions of this chapter. (Pub. L. 96–468, § 11, formerly § 12, Oct. 17, 1980, 94 Stat. 2233; renumbered § 11, Pub. L. 104–127, title IX, § 914(b)(2), Apr. 4, 1996, 110 Stat. 1186.)
Editorial Notes Prior ProvisionsA prior section 11 of Pub. L. 96–468 was classified to section 3810 of this title prior to repeal by Pub. L. 104–127.
